column5: when they really need D... 7 years 11 per
guess they want to take some pressure off Matthews. but yeah, defense was the hole that needed to be filled.
Where are these mythical D men that were ready to sign?
Who needs defence when you have this much offense! ?

It's not everyday a player at JT's caliber comes along and wants to play on your team enough to leave upwards of $14M on the table. Let him go and shop defense? lol Tavaras with Marner & Matthews with Nylander...Ohhh yeah!

Matthews Tavares Kadri down the middle isn't a bad problem to have. The Leafs think they can fill the defensive void internally with players they are developing in the AHL. Also there was not a big UFA defensive defenseman on the table July 1st.  A Babcock quote from 2015 on the day he was hired:  "Once we make it safe, they’re coming home. Mark my words, they’ll be coming.” - Speaking about Ontario born players.
